document_data.name: Amnemis
document_data.mainbody: '''Amnemis''' was a [[black dragon]] member of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
document_data.Relationships: She was the familiar of the [[half-dragon]] [[Vargo Kent]] but when she became too big, Vargo choose a new familiar and Amnemis became his cohort. In truth, Amnemis was very devoted to Vargo and was really jealous of other familiars.
document_data.Activities: The [[dragon]] resided in the [[Well of Dragons]] with her master.
